description: This vegan chocolate coconut oatmeal with caramelised banana makes a comforting breakfast that's filling, satisfying and ready in under 10 minutes! Serve with berries for a healthy start to the morning. Gluten-free and oil-free, with an overnight oats option.Â
keywords: Banana, chocolate, coconut, earth of maria, easy, oatmeal, Porridge, to move
name: Vegan Chocolate Coconut Oatmeal With Caramelised Banana
recipeIngredient: 1 oz dark chocolate (or 1 tbsp cacao powder)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oats, lemon zest, coconut sugar, coconut milk, plant based milk and dark chocolate to a non-stick saucepan. Cook over a medium heat, stirring frequently, for around 5 minutes, or until the oatmeal reaches your desired consistency.
Meanwhile, caramelise the banana. Heat the coconut sugar in a non-stick frying pan over a low heat with 1/2 tsp water. Add the banana slices and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side.
Serve the oatmeal with the caramelised banana on top and other toppings of your choice.

video.description: This vegan chocolate coconut oatmeal with caramelised banana makes a comforting breakfast that's filling, satisfying and ready in under 10 minutes! Serve with berries for a healthy start to the morning. Gluten-free and oil-free, with an overnight oats option.
video.name: Vegan Chocolate Coconut Oatmeal With Caramelised Banana
